newsitem.title: INDIA: INDIAN HEADLINE STOCKS - factors to watch-May 23.
newsitem.headline: INDIAN HEADLINE STOCKS - factors to watch-May 23.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors affecting Indian stock markets on Friday morning:
** India's largest private steelmaker Tata Iron and Steel Company Ltd (TISCO) to release earnings results for fiscal 1996/97 (April-March)
Analysts expect profits flat-to-lower due to sluggish
** Markets seen quiet ahead of expected increase in oil prices by the government on Sunday
